左程: (さほど) - not so; not particularly; not very; not that much
左端: (ひだりはし) - left end; left edge
左義長: (さぎちょう) - burning of New Year's gate decorations (usu. on the 15th day of the New Year)
左翼: (sayoku) - left-wing (politics); left wing (de um pássaro, aeronave, formação, etc.), left flank , left-wing (politics); left wing (of a bird, aircraft, formation, etc.), left flank; left field
左翼に走る: (さよくにはしる) - to turn leftist
左翼党: (さよくとう) - left-wing party; party of the left
左胸: (ひだりむね) - left breast; left side of the chest
左腕: (ひだりうで) - left arm; (さわん only) left-handed (baseball pitcher)
左腕投手: (さわんとうしゅ) - left-handed baseball pitcher
左表: (さひょう) - chart at the left
左褄: (ひだりづま) - left skirt of a kimono; geisha (because they often walked holding the left hem of their kimono)
左褄を取る: (ひだりづまをとる) - to become a geisha; to work as a geisha
左記: (さき) - (primarily used in vertical writing) undermentioned (statement); following; at left
左記補足: (さきほそく) - following supplements; supplementary information below
左詰め: (ひだりづめ) - left justification; aligning to the left
左辺: (さへん) - left side (of an equation, expression, etc.); LHS
左辺値: (さへんち) - left side value (of an equation)
左近の桜: (さこんのさくら) - cherry tree east of the southern stairs of the Hall for State Ceremonies (in Heian Palace)
左遣い: (ひだりづかい) - left puppeteer (bunraku); manipulates the left arm
左遷: (させん) - demotion; relegation; reduction in rank; degradation; downward move
左隅: (ひだりすみ) - left-hand corner; lower left
左隣: (ひだりどなり) - neighbour to the left
左顧右眄: (さこうべん) - (yoji) looking right and left or all about; vacillation
巧い: (うまい) - (esp. 上手い,巧い) skillful/clever/expert/wise/successful; (esp. 美味い,甘い) delicious/appetizing/appetising; (esp. 旨い) fortunate/splendid/promising
巧くやる: (うまくやる) - to manage something successfully; to be successful
巧み: (takumi) - habilidoso, ágil, dextrous, magistral, esperto, engenhoso, astuto
巧みな手段: (たくみなしゅだん) - clever trick
巧みに操る: (たくみにあやつる) - to maneuver; to manoeuvre; to manipulate
巧む: (たくむ) - to devise; to plot; to plan
巧を誇る: (こうをほこる) - to be of excellent workmanship
巧咲: (こうしょう) - courteous laughter; forced laughter
巧手: (こうしゅ) - expert/skillful person; good move (in shogi, go, etc.)/clever move
巧笑: (こうしょう) - courteous laughter; forced laughter
巧者: (こうしゃ) - cleverness/skill/tact; clever person (in a particular field)/skillful person (skilful)
巧言令色: (こうげんれいしょく) - (yoji) flattery; honeyed words
巧言令色すくなし仁: (こうげんれいしょくすくなしじん) - those who resort to blandishments and fawning smiles are apt to lack compassion; a honeyed tongue with a heart of gall
巧言令色少なし仁: (こうげんれいしょくすくなしじん) - those who resort to blandishments and fawning smiles are apt to lack compassion; a honeyed tongue with a heart of gall
巧言令色鮮し仁: (こうげんれいしょくすくなしじん) - those who resort to blandishments and fawning smiles are apt to lack compassion; a honeyed tongue with a heart of gall
巧遅拙速: (こうちせっそく) - (yoji) better being rough and ready than slow and elaborate; better being brisk and sharp than slow and prudent
巨人国: (きょじんこく) - land of giants
巨人軍: (きょじんぐん) - Giants (Japanese baseball team)
巨嘴鳥座: (きょしちょうざ) - Tucana (constellation); the Toucan
巨塔: (きょとう) - tall tower; large tower
巨大企業: (きょだいきぎょう) - corporate giant
巨大分子雲: (きょだいぶんしうん) - {astron} giant molecular cloud; GMC
巨大地震: (きょだいじしん) - giant earthquake; massive earthquake
巨大波: (きょだいは) - giant wave; large wave
巨大複合企業: (きょだいふくごうきぎょう) - large conglomerate; large group of related companies
巨悪: (きょあく) - great evil; consummate villain
巨星: (きょせい) - {astron}  giant star; great man/big-shot/superstar
